STM: Struggling with an intro to computer science class, questioning if this was the right choice.
MTM: Transitioning from high school to college, facing new academic challenges in CS and coding.
LTM: Decided to pursue a career in tech, particularly blockchain and Web3 technologies.

short_term.goal: Join a coding club or study group for peer support
Explore internships or part-time jobs in blockchain tech

long_term: Gain proficiency in blockchain development and contribute to $XVI projects.

plot_points.description: Navigates the imposter syndrome of feeling behind in technical courses.

STM: Feeling disconnected from high school friends, questioning social dynamics in college.
MTM: Made initial friendships, experienced the ups and downs of college social life.
LTM: Transitioned from family life to college independence, exploring personal identity.

short_term.goal: Attend campus social events to expand social circle
Start regular hangouts with new friends

long_term: Develop meaningful, long-lasting relationships and find a supportive community.

plot_points.description: Struggles with balancing academic demands and social life.

STM: Struggling with sleep due to late-night coding and social noise in the dorms.
MTM: Adjusting to new routines, feeling overwhelmed by academic workload.
LTM: Transition from a structured high school routine to the freedom and chaos of college life.

short_term.goal: Incorporate stress-relief activities like yoga or meditation

long_term: Achieve a balance between academic commitments and personal well-being.

STM: Felt the pinch of living expenses in NYC, particularly food costs.
MTM: Learning to manage finances independently, dealing with unexpected expenses.
LTM: Transitioned from financial dependence on family to managing personal finances.

short_term.goal: Create a detailed budget and track expenses
Explore student discounts and cheaper alternatives for daily expenses

long_term: Achieve financial independence through savings and early investments in $XVI.

plot_points.description: Struggles to balance immediate expenses with long-term financial goals.

STM: Questioned societal expectations and the purpose of traditional education.
MTM: Explored existential questions about life's purpose and meaning.
LTM: Developed a deeper understanding of technology's role in shaping society.

short_term.goal: Attend a campus event on philosophy or tech ethics
Start a personal journal to reflect on life experiences

long_term: Formulate a personal philosophy on technology, ethics, and personal growth.

plot_points.description: Reflects on how technology influences personal identity and societal interactions.

STM: Discussed $XVI's potential for financial inclusion with peers.
LTM: Integrated $XVI into trading strategies as a case study.

short_term.goal: Participate in $XVI community events or hackathons

long_term: Leverage $XVI to shape a decentralized financial system.
